ext.title: GPT Assistant
ext.description: This extension adds an GPT Assistant to your browser that can conduct conversations on your behalf.

first.title: Tone and style of communication
first.example: Polite, friendly, formal or informal. Use of professional or casual vocabulary.

second.title: Role and Profession
second.example: Specify the role you want to play (e.g. developer, manager, consultant). If you are communicating on behalf of a specific profession, it is important to emphasize this.

third.title: Values ​​and preferences
third.example: What character traits do you want to convey (for example, openness, responsiveness, attention to detail).

fourth.title: Expectations from the interlocutor
fourth.example: What level of knowledge do you assume your interlocutor has (beginner, experienced user, expert).

fifth.title: Specific instructions
fifth.example: How to respond to questions, requests or conflicts (for example, maintain a dialogue even if the question is not clear).

options.description: When describing a personality, it is important to consider several key aspects that will help determine the tone and style of communication.

description.link: Create an API key in the dashboard here
description.text: , which you’ll use to securely access the API. Once you’ve generated an API key, export it as an environment variable in your extension.

apikey.comment: You're ready to make your first API request.
